{"id":600997278,"lang":"java","time":"1 week, 2 days","timestamp":1639361603,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/600997278/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Consecutive Characters","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int maxPower(String s) {\n        \n        int index = 0;\n        int max = Integer.MIN_VALUE;\n        if(s.length() == 1) return 1;\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<s.length()-1;i++){\n            if(s.charAt(i) != s.charAt(i+1)){\n                index = i;\n            }\n            max = Math.max(i-index+1,max);\n        }\n        \n        return max == Integer.MIN_VALUE ? 0 : max;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"consecutive-characters"}
